Package DAO

Class DBAppointments

java.lang.Object
DAO.DBAppointments
public class DBAppointments extends Object
This class is a collection of methods that include appointment-related SQL queries/updates sent to the database server.

  • Method Details

    • getAllAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointments() throws SQLException
      This method gets all appointments. It executes a query that returns all appointments along with their contact names. Then it adds each appointment to a list.
      Returns:
      A list of all appointments.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Database error. Issue executing/retrieving SQL operation.

    • addAppointment

      public static int addAppointment(String title, String description, String location, String contact, String type, ZonedDateTime localStart, ZonedDateTime localEnd, int customerId, int userId) throws SQLException
      This method adds an appointment to the database. It executes an insert operation with information from the arguments, as well as the current time and active user.
      Parameters:
      title - The appointment's title.
      description - The appointment's description.
      location - The appointment's location.
      contact - The appointment's contact.
      type - The appointment's type.
      localStart - The appointment's start dateTime in local time.
      localEnd - The appointment's end dateTime in local time.
      customerId - The appointment's customer Id.
      userId - The appointment's user Id.
      Returns:
      An integer representing the number of rows affected. A zero indicates failure of the operation.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Database error. Issue executing/retrieving SQL operation.

    • updateAppointment

      public static int updateAppointment(int appointmentId, String title, String description, String location, String contact, String type, ZonedDateTime localStart, ZonedDateTime localEnd, int customerId, int userId) throws SQLException
      This method updates an appointment in the database. It executes an update operation with information from the arguments, as well as the current time and active user.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The appointment's Id.
      title - The appointment's title.
      description - The appointment's description.
      location - The appointment's location.
      contact - The appointment's contact.
      type - The appointment's type.
      localStart - The appointment's start dateTime in local time.
      localEnd - The appointment's end dateTime in local time.
      customerId - The appointment's customer Id.
      userId - The appointment's user Id.
      Returns:
      An integer representing the number of rows affected. A zero indicates failure of the operation.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Database error. Issue executing/retrieving SQL operation.

    • deleteAppointment

      public static int deleteAppointment(int appointmentId) throws SQLException
      This method deletes an appointment from the database. It executes a delete operation using a specified appointment id.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The id of the appointment to be deleted.
      Returns:
      An integer representing the number of rows affected. A zero indicates failure of the operation.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Database error. Issue executing/retrieving SQL operation.

    • deleteAppointmentsOfCustomer

      public static int deleteAppointmentsOfCustomer(int customerId) throws SQLException
      This method deletes all appointments tied to a specified customer from the database. It executes a delete operation using a specified customer id.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The id of the customer whose appointments are to be deleted.
      Returns:
      An integer representing the number of rows affected. A zero indicates failure of the operation.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Database error. Issue executing/retrieving SQL operation.

    • getAllTypes

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> getAllTypes() throws SQLException
      This method gets all the types of existing appointments. It executes a query that returns all appointments. Then the method adds the type of each appointment to a list, not allowing for repeated values.
      Returns:
      A list of all appointment types.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Database error. Issue executing/retrieving SQL operation.

    • getNumAppts

      public static int getNumAppts(Month month, String type) throws SQLException
      This method finds the number of appointments for a specified type and month of this year. It executes a query that returns the count of appointments with start dates between the first of the current month and the first of following month.
      Parameters:
      month - The month in which the appointments take place.
      type - The type of the appointments.
      Returns:
      The number of appointments for a specified type and month of this year.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Database error. Issue executing/retrieving SQL operation.

    • getApptsByContact

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getApptsByContact(String contactName) throws SQLException
      This method gets all of the appointments tied to a specified contact. It executes a query that returns the appointments with contact ids that are tied to the specified contact.
      Parameters:
      contactName - The name of the contact.
      Returns:
      A list of the contact's appointments.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Database error. Issue executing/retrieving SQL operation.

    • getImminentAppts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getImminentAppts() throws SQLException
      This method gets all ongoing or upcoming appointments. It executes a query that returns the appointments with start times between 60 minutes ago and 15 minutes from now.
      Returns:
      A list of ongoing and upcoming appointments.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Database error. Issue executing/retrieving SQL operation.
